title: log
text:
This is my logbook. My thoughts, ideas, and experiences.
I go by the handle TokenBender. I am an engineer, a hacker, a consultant.
I love to learn. I love to make tools. I love to solve problems.
I think of myself as a very pragmatic generalist.

title: log
text:
Consulting
I offer consulting services in the areas of multimodal RAG, advanced search orchestration, building models, datasets, local model deployment. Reach out to me:

title: log
text:
Philosophy
I am a firm believer in the open web.
My core philosophy is interacting with the AI world via tools of experimentation and observation.
